vclaim: In June 2019, J.K. Rowling definitively confirmed her antipathy towards trans women and/or opposition to trans inclusion.
title: Did J.K. Rowling ‘Confirm Her Stance Against Transgender Women’?
subtitle: A thought-provoking, widely shared blog post made a series of allegations against the "Harry Potter" creator in June 2019. Six months later, the author broke her conspicuous silence on trans issues.
author: Dan MacGuill
